Northland’s Hihiaua Cultural Centre begins work on stage two of development https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-maori-culture-centre-continuing-to-ride-waka-of-inclusion/UB45SMRULVE6FNAWXU3IMN5IIU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-maori-culture-centre-continuing-to-ride-waka-of-inclusion/UB45SMRULVE6FNAWXU3IMN5IIU/ Denise PiperBringing the community on board has been Hihiaua's key to success. Photo / Michael Cunningham
